author: sstreet
title: Arsene Wenger claims he couldn’t see Alexis Sanchez’s handball from the stands against Hull
text:
'I didn't see it' Arsene Wenger claims he couldn’t see Alexis Sanchez’s handball from the stands against Hull 
Wenger was serving the last game of a touchline ban and claims to have missed the Chilean's handball in the build up to Gunners' first goal By SAM STREET
